scripts.deploy: npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const cwd=process.cwd();const root=path.resolve(cwd,'..');const docs=path.join(root,'docs');fs.rmSync(docs,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(docs,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(path.join(cwd,'dist'),docs,{recursive:true});fs.writeFileSync(path.join(docs,'CNAME'),'tkhtec.org');fs.copyFileSync(path.join(docs,'index.html'),path.join(docs,'404.html'));" && git -C .. add docs -A && git -C .. commit -m "Deploy" && git -C .. push
